description:
In an interview ahead of Digital Transformation Week, Angel Montesdeoca, Program Director of Product Management for watsonx Code Assistant at IBM, discussed the company’s approach to integrating AI into software development tools and accelerating the application lifecycle. The age of generative AI  According to Montesdeoca, we are living in “the age of generative AI” with... Read more »

The post Angel Montesdeoca, IBM: The role of AI in modern software development appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Angel Montesdeoca, IBM: The role of AI in modern software development
